name: pokeaimMD Skin - Pokemon Showdown
description:
This Pokemon Showdown skin was designed and created for pokeaimMD, for his use of content on what-ever platform he wishes to use! (However this wasn't made by pokeaimMD, but he was involved with every process made in this design!).

pokeaimMD Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/user/pokeaimMD/

This Style only runs on:
 - play.pokemonshowdown.com
 - replay.pokemonshowdown.com
 - psim.us
additional_info:
This is version: 1.0.2b
- 13/02/2020(9:28pm): Bug Fix
- 16/02/2020(6:15pm): Branding Update/Change

!!!PLEASE READ BELOW!!!
This is BETA, so the only bugs fixed are ones that we've found/corrected ourselves. Bugs will be fixed when time is allotted! For obvious reasons, I'm not 24/7 on this project, so updates/fixes will take time to process/if it's really an issue. Please understand that this isn't 100% mine.

Sidenote: I'm also not a big time user of Pokemon Showdown, this was created for the use of pokeaimMD and anyone else who wishes. So certain terminology will be lost-in-translation with me, if making bug reports!

Credits:
pokeaimMD - Design\Concept
PedroJayMiranda - Graphical\Concept\Markup
KLou - Background
Laura - Design\Markup

Maintainers: Laura - PedroJayMiranda
